name: Sule Smith
title: Mechanical Engineer
summary: I'm a seasoned mechanical engineer passionate about tackling challenges and driving innovation. Proficient in CAD and design software, I excel at turning concepts into tangible solutions. With a collaborative approach, I thrive on teamwork and communication across diverse backgrounds. Eager to stay abreast of new technologies, I'm committed to personal and professional growth. Excited to further contribute value and innovation to the company.

education.institution: Southern Taiwan University of Science and Technology

description: Analyzing semiconductor processes including PVD, CVD, and ALD.
Gaining hands-on experience with advanced semiconductor coating techniques and cleanroom protocols.
Designed 3D models and engineering drawings using SolidWorks for manufacturing equipment.
Programmed PLC control logic for industrial automation systems to improve line efficiency.
Performed onsite troubleshooting and maintenance of jobsite machinery to reduce downtime.
Developing and teaching curriculum for Robotics, Minecraft Education, and LEGO Engineering.
Managing classroom activities and coordinating STEM events for the institute.
Translating complex engineering concepts into accessible lessons for students.
Managed showroom inventory and coordinated logistics for client deliveries.
Executed precise assembly of complex modular furniture systems based on technical schematics.
Resolved client issues and maintained high service standards in a fast-paced retail environment.
